PACKAGE.NAME: BANK_DATA
PACKAGE.COMMENT:
========================================================================
Project: Test Project (PLDoc)
Description: Testing national character here: äöüõçï
DB impact: YES
Commit inside: NO
Rollback inside: NO
------------------------------------------------------------------------
$Header: /cvsroot/pldoc/sources/samples/sample1.sql,v 1.17 2003/08/30 07:52:44 altumano Exp $
========================================================================

RETURN.TYPE: TABLE OF INTEGER INDEX BY VARCHAR2(30)
TABLE OF bank_type INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER

RETURN.COMMENT:
return code, 0 is ok
<>0 means a problem:
-1 unknown error
-2 locking error

TAG.COMMENT:
return code, 0 is ok
<>0 means a problem:
-1 unknown error
-2 locking error

FUNCTION.NAME: GET_TABLE
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Gets bank data table (0 or 1 record) by bank ID.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Gets bank data table (0 or 1 record) by bank ID.

ARGUMENT.NAME: P_ID
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: bank ID, second line is also allowed, and third, too

TAG.COMMENT: p_id bank ID, second line is also allowed, and third, too
r_result return code, 0=ok, -1 error, -2 severe error
ORA-20001 if some error was recognized
ORA-xxxxx if some unexpected error occured

PACKAGE.NAME: ADVICE_DATA
PACKAGE.COMMENT:
========================================================================
Project: Test Project (PLDoc)
Description: Advices
DB impact: YES
Commit inside: YES
Rollback inside: YES
========================================================================

RETURN.TYPE: TABLE OF advice_type_record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER
TABLE OF advice_medium_record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER
TABLE OF advice_record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER
TABLE OF sw_advice_record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER
TABLE OF files_record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_ADVICE_DEFAULTS
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Gets defaults of an advice type (for given sector).
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Gets defaults of an advice type (for given sector).

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_ADVICE_MEDIUM
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Gets record of an advice medium
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Gets record of an advice medium

PROCEDURE.NAME: LIST_ADVICES
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Get list of advices on contract
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Get list of advices on contract

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_SW_ADVICE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Get list of SWIFT messages under SWIFT advice
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Get list of SWIFT messages under SWIFT advice

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_FILES
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Get list of files under the document
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Get list of files under the document

PROCEDURE.NAME: CFR_ADVICE_OUT
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Clearance for release of outgoing advices.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Clearance for release of outgoing advices.

PROCEDURE.NAME: CFR_ADVICE_IN
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Clearance for release of incoming advices.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Clearance for release of incoming advices.

RETURN.TYPE: TABLE OF customer_type INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER
TABLE OF loan_customer_type INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_LOAN_CUSTOMER
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Get loan-related customer data by customer ID.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Get loan-related customer data by customer ID.

RETURN.TYPE: TABLE OF VARCHAR2(32000) INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER

FUNCTION.NAME: PUT
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Storing a large object; returns ID
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Storing a large object; returns ID

FUNCTION.NAME: GET
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Loading a large object by ID
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Loading a large object by ID

RETURN.TYPE: TABLE OF Log_Record INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER

PROCEDURE.NAME: ADD_ERROR
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Records an ERROR in the error logging table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Records an ERROR in the error logging table.

PROCEDURE.NAME: ADD_WARNING
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Records a WARNING in the error logging table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Records a WARNING in the error logging table.

PROCEDURE.NAME: ADD_TRACE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Records a TRACE in the error logging table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Records a TRACE in the error logging table.

PROCEDURE.NAME: ADD_RECORD
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Records an event in the error logging table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Records an event in the error logging table.

PROCEDURE.NAME: FLUSH
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Saves pending logs into the log table
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Saves pending logs into the log table

PROCEDURE.NAME: SHOW_OUTPUT
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Shows pending logs on DBMS_OUTPUT, without erasing them
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Shows pending logs on DBMS_OUTPUT, without erasing them

CONSTANT.NAME: VCCONSTANT
CONSTANT.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Constant, which will be shown with value in html.
CONSTANT.COMMENT: Constant, which will be shown with value in html.

PROCEDURE.NAME: PR_MIXED_CASE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Test (in Specification) procedure to show, that parameters named in mixed case, are shown in lower case in the output.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Test (in Specification) procedure to show, that parameters named in mixed case, are shown in lower case in the output.

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_VCMIXEDCASE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: This mixed case parameter has an inline @deprecated deprecated tag.

TAG.COMMENT: i_vcMixedCase This mixed case parameter has an inline @deprecated deprecated tag.
Demonstrating that single sentence deprecated method comments are processed correctly.

FUNCTION.NAME: PR_DEFAULT_PARAMETER
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Test (in Specification) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Test (in Specification) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.

TAG.COMMENT: Demonstrating that multi-sentence deprecated method comments are processed correctly.

PROCEDURE.NAME: PR_MIXED_CASE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Test (in BODY) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Test (in BODY) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.

ARGUMENT.NAME: I_VCMIXEDCASE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: This mixed case parameter has an inline @deprecated deprecated tag.

TAG.COMMENT: i_vcMixedCase This mixed case parameter has an inline @deprecated deprecated tag.

PROCEDURE.NAME: PR_DEFAULT_PARAMETER
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Test (in BODY) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Test (in BODY) procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.

FUNCTION.NAME: PR_PRIVATE_PROCEDURE
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Test (in BODY) private procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Test (in BODY) private procedure to show, that for parameters which have a default, the default is shown in the output.
